Address.Address1: Al Fahidi St - Bur Dubai, Po Box 457

Description.Text: The 3-star Astoria Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Dubai. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage are readily available for you to enjoy. Wake-up service, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, mini bar can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Astoria Hotel caters to your needs.
